mapper.insert: insert into bci_task (user_id, team_id, code_id, paradigm_id, task_type, task_name, dataset, compute_node_ip) values (#{taskDO.userId}, #{taskDO.teamId}, #{taskDO.codeId}, #{taskDO.paradigmId}, #{taskDO.taskType}, #{taskDO.taskName}, #{taskDO.dataset}, #{taskDO.computeNodeIp})
mapper.update: update bci_task set score = #{score} where id = #{taskId}
update bci_task set container_id = #{taskDO.containerId}, status = #{taskDO.status}, compute_node_ip = #{taskDO.computeNodeIp} where id = #{taskDO.id}
update bci_task set status = #{task.status} where id = #{task.id}
UPDATE bci_compute_resource SET running_tasks = running_tasks+1 where ip = #{computeNodeIp}
UPDATE bci_compute_resource SET running_tasks = running_tasks-1 where ip = #{computeNodeIp}
mapper.delete: update bci_task set show_status = 0 where id = #{taskId}
mapper.select: select id, ip, running_tasks, max_tasks, status from bci_compute_resource

select count(*) total from (select team_id from bci_task where `paradigm_id` = #{paradigmId} and status = 2 and dataset = #{dataset} and show_status = 1 and score is not null and create_time < #{dateLine} group by team_id) ts
